item.title: Making npcs do animations [317] [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

NPCHandles.java:2494: cannot find symbol

This means that you have to add a new method.

Read full topic

item.title: Making npcs do animations [317] [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @jailed jailed
item.description:
@jailed wrote:

want an npc to do an aninmation.
i tried this code in npchandles

if(npcs[i].npcType == 17){ npcs[i].setAnimation(2048); npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

but it gave these compiler errors:

[code]NPCHandles.java:2494: cannot find symbol
symbol : method startAnimation(int)
location: class NPC
npcs[i].startAnimation(2048);

NPCHandler.java: 2496: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable appearanceUpdateRequired
location: class NPC
npcs[i].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

2 errors
Finished!
Press any key to continueâ€¦[/code]

i also tried this code in npchandler:

if(npcs[i].npcType == 17){ npcs[i].animNumber(2048); npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true; }

but that gave this compiler error:

NPCHandler.java:2494: cannot find symbol symbol : method animNumber(int) location: class NPC npcs[i].animNumber(2048); ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue...

Read full topic
